sentences.sContent: Rich countries use foreign aid as a lever to achieve political aims.
sentences.sCn: 富国利用对外援助作为达到政治目的的手段。

sentences.sContent: ...The levers and light were set up in exactly the same way except that this time it was only Doris who could see the light indicating which lever to press first...
...the dolphins were supposed to press the left-hand lever followed by the right-hand one...

phrases.pCn: 手柄；杠杆手柄；杆式手柄；手柄操纵杆
连接棒；连接杆；连接杠杆

remMethod.val: lev(举起， 变轻) ＋ er → 用来举起东西的工具 → 杠杆

words.tran: 手段，影响力；杠杆作用；杠杆效率
利用贷款进行投机（leverage的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: something you use to influence a situation to get the result that you want
